pkgmetadata.longdescription: Convert Files to Parquet Format // Collection of functions to get files in parquet format. Parquet is a columnar storage file format https://parquet.apache.org/. The files to convert can be of several formats ("csv", "duckdb", "RData", "rds", "RSQLite", "json", "ndjson", "SAS", "SPSS"...).
